title: Exploring and Critically Analyzing American Literature: WebQuest-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English reading comprehension skills and foundational understanding of literary works
context.additional_context: Students explore American literary works in virtual environments using personal devices and experience critically evaluating online resources. Includes simulated collaborative activities with librarians

learning_goals: Students can explain methods to identify and evaluate credible online literary resources.
Students can write a report analyzing the historical and cultural contexts of a specific American literary work through a webquest.
Students can demonstrate the digital curation process of literary materials through collaborative learning in VR-based simulations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
